name: PeridoxRTU®
description: PeridoxRTU is an EPA-registered sporicide, disinfectant, and cleaner. to eradicate and prevent the spread of spores as well as over 40 other pathogens This broad-spectrum disinfectant has a quick kill time and is effective against bacterial spores. bacteria and viruses in 2 minutes, fungi in 1 minute, and tuberculosis in 5 minutes minutes. PeridoxRTU has more than 40 EPA-approved claims. It is also very effective. in killing fungi such as Aspergillus niger on non-porous surfaces in 1 minute and on porous surfaces in 1 minute in 10 minutes* porous surfaces To disinfect the most critical cleanrooms PeridoxRTU is available in validated sterile to 10-6 SAL and controlled environments. guidelines ANSI/AAMI/ISO 11137 On request, full documentation is provided.
